message: Let's get this started! I'm willing to give you a decent chunk, but don't expect me to be generous forever.
You were too stingy, now it's my turn to be generous... or not.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but don't think this is the final offer!
You're getting closer to the middle, but I'm not there yet...
I'm getting closer to the middle, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Don't expect me to give up now!
You're getting closer, but I'm still not budging...
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but this is my final offer. Take it or leave it!
